TopicTitle: A mod that tells me my action groups in spaceflight.

Articles.Content: I would like a mod that displays my action groups during launch and flight.

ActionGroupsExtended http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74195 allows you to see and edit action groups in flight. It also gives you 255 possible action groups. Dazio has made a number of action group related mods - might check them if you use action group extensively.

ActionGroupManager (still works in 1.0.4) does the same without giving you a near fatal overdose of additional actiongroups.

It can take a bit of getting used to but once you do you can't go without any more.
